text: waeddu - ya maeshar almuslimin - limuajahat aedaykm kl ma taqdarun ealayh min eadad wedt, ltudkhlu bdhlk alrhbt fi qulub 'aeda' allah waedaykm almutarabisin bkm, wtkhyfu akharin la tazhar lakum edawthm alan, lkn allah yaelamuhum wayaelam ma ydmrwnh. wama tbdhlu min maal wghyrh fi sabil allah qalilana 'aw kthyrana yukhlifuh allah ealaykum fi aldnya, wydkhr lakum thwabh 'iilaa yawm alqyamt, wa'antum la tunqswn min 'ajr dhlk shyyana
